description.value:
You were born in a rain forest with only tangles of trees
providing protection from torrential rainstorms and flash
floods. Youâ€™ve learned to move adeptly through jungle
terrain and resist the various ailments common in humid
environs. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics
checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} and a +1 circumstance bonus to
saving throws against diseases.
